scripts.sass-bootstrap: node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style expanded src/sass/bootstrap.scss > src/css/bootstrap.css && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style compressed src/sass/bootstrap.scss src/css/bootstrap.min.css
scripts.sass-style: node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style expanded src/sass/style.scss > src/css/style.css && node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style compressed src/sass/style.scss src/css/style.min.css
scripts.sass: npm run sass-bootstrap && npm run sass-style
scripts.build: npm run sass && NODE_ENV=development node build
scripts.build-prod: npm run sass && NODE_ENV=production node build
